TEXT.TITLE: FLEET FINANCIAL GROUP <FLT> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr primary 73 cts vs 60 cts Shr diluted 70 cts vs 58 cts Net 38,528,000 vs 31,680,000 Avg shares 52,087,634 vs 51,294,652 NOTE: Qtr net interest income is 130.7 mln dlrs vs 114.8 mln dlrs. Earnings per share reflects two-for-one common stock split on March 15. Reuter
